text:
December 17, 1954
Mr. William G. Harley, Chairman
Television Operations Committee, NAEB
WHA-TV
Wisconsin State Radio Council
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
We have tabulated the votes on Item 1 and 2
dated 11-17-54.
The Board has approved the Treasurerâ€™s bond
as indicated in the submitted Board memorandum by an
11 to 0 vote.
The Board approved designation of the depository
as indicated on the submitted Board memorandum by a
vote of 11 to 0.
Sincerely yours,
FES:fmh
Frank E. Schooley
President
